amendment.description: Amendment en bloc consists of those amendments contained in House Report 107-615 which are printed on pages H5817-H5822 in the Congressional Record for July 26, 2002.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 21 printed in House Report 107-615 consisting of sundry technical and clarifying provisions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Armey amendment (A021) Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 204 (Roll no. 361).
